verses.roman:
kīrtana-āṭope pṛthivī kare ṭalamala
'hari-dhvani' kare loka, haila kolāhala

synonyms: kīrtana-āṭope—by the force of congregational chanting; pṛthivī—the whole world; kare ṭalamala—trembles; hari-dhvani kare—chanted the transcendental sound Hari; loka—people in general; haila—there was; kolāhala—a tumultuous sound.
translation: Due to the forceful vibration of kīrtana, the entire world began trembling. When everyone chanted the holy name, they made a tumultuous sound.
